H0.text: Luke, who is your father. Obi-Wan Kenobi

H1.text: Luke, who is your father. Yoda

H2.text: Luke, who is your father. Han Solo

H3.text: Luke, who is your father. Aniken

A4.text: Obi-Wan confirms that Vader is Luke's father, and reveals that Leia is Luke's twin sister.

A5.text: Yoda confirms that Vader is Luke's father, something Vader had told Luke in the previous film.
